verses.text: \w For|strong="G1063"\w* as \w touching|strong="G4012"\w* the \w ministering|strong="G1248"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*, it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w superfluous|strong="G4053"\w* for \w me|strong="G3427"\w* to \w write|strong="G1125"\w* to \w you|strong="G5213"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w know|strong="G1492"\w* the \w forwardness|strong="G4288"\w* of your \w mind|strong="G5216"\w*, for \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I \w boast|strong="G2744"\w* \w of|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* to them of \w Macedonia|strong="G3110"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Achaia|strong="G0882"\w* was \w ready|strong="G3903"\w* a year \w ago|strong="G4070"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w zeal|strong="G2205"\w* hath \w provoked|strong="G2042"\w* very \w many|strong="G4119"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="G1161"\w* have I \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w lest|strong="G2443"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w boasting|strong="G2745"\w* \w of|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* should be in \w vain|strong="G2758"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w behalf|strong="G3313"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* I \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, ye \w may|strong="G3903"\w* \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w ready|strong="G3903"\w*:

Lest \w haply|strong="G3381"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* they of \w Macedonia|strong="G3110"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w find|strong="G2147"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w unprepared|strong="G0532"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* (\w that|strong="G2443"\w* we \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \w ye|strong="G5210"\w*) should be \w ashamed|strong="G2617"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* this \w same|strong="G3778"\w* \w confident|strong="G5287"\w* \w boasting|strong="G2746"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* I thought \w it|strong="G2233"\w* \w necessary|strong="G0316"\w* to \w exhort|strong="G3870"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they would go \w before|strong="G4281"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* make up \w beforehand|strong="G4294"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w bounty|strong="G2129"\w*, whereof ye had notice \w before|strong="G4293"\w*, that the \w same|strong="G3778"\w* might \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w ready|strong="G2092"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \add a matter of\add* \w bounty|strong="G2129"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w as|strong="G5618"\w* \add of\add* \w covetousness|strong="G4124"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \add I say\add*, \w He|strong="G3588"\w* which \w soweth|strong="G4687"\w* \w sparingly|strong="G5340"\w* shall \w reap|strong="G2325"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w sparingly|strong="G5340"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* which \w soweth|strong="G4687"\w* \w bountifully|strong="G2129"\w* shall \w reap|strong="G2325"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w bountifully|strong="G2129"\w*.

Every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* according \w as|strong="G2531"\w* he \w purposeth|strong="G4255"\w* in his \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \add so let him give\add*; \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w grudgingly|strong="G3077"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w necessity|strong="G0318"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w loveth|strong="G0025"\w* a \w cheerful|strong="G2431"\w* \w giver|strong="G1395"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \add is\add* \w able|strong="G1415"\w* to make \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w abound|strong="G4052"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye, \w always|strong="G3842"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w sufficiency|strong="G0841"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add things\add*, may \w abound|strong="G4052"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*:

(\w As|strong="G2531"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, He hath dispersed \w abroad|strong="G4650"\w*; he hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* to the \w poor|strong="G3993"\w*: \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w remaineth|strong="G3306"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w ministereth|strong="G2023"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w* to the \w sower|strong="G4687"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w minister|strong="G5524"\w* \w bread|strong="G0740"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \add your\add* \w food|strong="G1035"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w multiply|strong="G4129"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* seed \w sown|strong="G4703"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w increase|strong="G0837"\w* the \w fruits|strong="G1081"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*;)

Being \w enriched|strong="G4148"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* every \w thing|strong="G3956"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w bountifulness|strong="G0572"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w causeth|strong="G2716"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="G2169"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* the \w administration|strong="G1248"\w* of \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w service|strong="G3009"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w supplieth|strong="G4322"\w* the \w want|strong="G5303"\w* of the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w abundant|strong="G4052"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w thanksgivings|strong="G2169"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;

\w Whiles|strong="G1223"\w* by the \w experiment|strong="G1382"\w* of \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w ministration|strong="G1248"\w* they \w glorify|strong="G1392"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w professed|strong="G3671"\w* \w subjection|strong="G5292"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* for \add your\add* \w liberal|strong="G0572"\w* \w distribution|strong="G2842"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* by \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w prayer|strong="G1162"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, which long \w after|strong="G1971"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w exceeding|strong="G5235"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*.

\w Thanks|strong="G5485"\w* \add be\add* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w unspeakable|strong="G0411"\w* \w gift|strong="G1431"\w*.
